ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may state your own name. If you do, your opponent may state his or her own name. If he or she does, all players put the top card of their decks into their stock. (Please take care to avoid disrupting your surroundings)
【AUTO】 At the beginning of your opponent's attack phase, you may move this card to an open position of your center stage.
flavor_text: I am called Bukkororii! The son of the foremost cobbler among the Crimson Demons! Arch wizard, and wielder of advanced magic!

name: "Loading Up with Magic Power" Wiz
expansion: KONOSUBA -God’s blessing on this wonderful world! Legend of Crimson
ability: 【AUTO】 [(1) Put the top card of your deck into your clock] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to 1 cost 0 or lower 《Adventurer》 or 《Magic》 character with level equal to or lower than your level, put it on any position of your stage, and shuffle your deck.
flavor_text: Now, everyone, while Kazuma and the others are buying time, give me your magic power!

name: "Unreasonable Demand" Megumin
expansion: KONOSUBA -God’s blessing on this wonderful world! Legend of Crimson
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】 in battle, put 5 cards from the top of your deck into your waiting room. If there is an ""Unreasonable Demand" Megumin" among those cards, you may return this card to your hand.
【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】, if this card's battle opponent is level 1 or lower, you may 【REVERSE】 that character.
flavor_text: Also, I demand you return my Explosion.

name: "Unyielding Spirit of Rivalry" Megumin
expansion: KONOSUBA -God’s blessing on this wonderful world! Legend of Crimson
ability: 【CONT】 During your turn, this card gets +4000 power.
flavor_text: I'm not going to let her take that title.

name: "Fierce Battle" Wiz
expansion: KONOSUBA -God’s blessing on this wonderful world! Legend of Crimson
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, this card gets +1500 power until end of turn.

【ACT】 [Put 1 climax from your hand into your waiting room] This card gets +1500 power and the following ability until end of turn. "【AUTO】 When this card attacks, reveal the top 2 cards of your deck, your opponent chooses 1 character or event card from among them, you put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room."

name: "Important Friend" Megumin
expansion: KONOSUBA -God’s blessing on this wonderful world! Legend of Crimson
ability: 【CONT】 If you do not have any other 《Adventurer》 or 《Magic》 characters, this card does not 【STAND】 during your stand phase.
【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, look at the top card of your deck, and put it on the top of your deck or into your waiting room.
flavor_text: Bukkororii: "Megumin, your friends seem really nice."

name: "Party Member?" Yunyun
expansion: KONOSUBA -God’s blessing on this wonderful world! Legend of Crimson
ability: 【CONT】 If the character facing this card is a higher level than this card, this card cannot frontal attack.

【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, put the top card of your deck into your waiting room. If that card is level 0 or lower, choose 1 cost 0 or lower character on your opponent's center stage, and put it into his or her waiting room. (Climax are regarded as level 0)
flavor_text: Dodonko: "And you people are the members of Yunyun's party?"

name: "Supportive Cover" Yuiyui
expansion: KONOSUBA -God’s blessing on this wonderful world! Legend of Crimson
ability: 【AUTO】 [(4) Put 1 《Adventurer》 or 《Magic》 character from your hand into your waiting room] When you use this card's "Backup", you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 of your opponent's characters, and 【REST】 it.

【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 2500, Level 2 [(1) Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose 1 of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +2500 power until end of turn)
flavor_text: Well, enjoy yourselves!

name: "Receiving Guests" Komekko
expansion: KONOSUBA -God’s blessing on this wonderful world! Legend of Crimson
ability: 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 [(1)] When this card attacks, if "Homecoming and Welcome Greetings" is in your climax area, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose up to 3 cards in your opponent's waiting room, return them to his or her deck, and your opponent shuffles his or her deck.
flavor_text: Aqua: "It's like having a mini Megumin!"

name: "Today's Explosion Magic" Megumin
expansion: KONOSUBA -God’s blessing on this wonderful world! Legend of Crimson
ability: 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, choose up to 1 "An Explosion A Day" in your waiting room, return it to your hand, and this card gets +1000 power until end of turn.

【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 [Put all cards in your hand and stock into your waiting room & Put 1 "An Explosion A Day" from your climax area into your waiting room] At the beginning of your attack phase, if this card is 【STAND】 on your center stage, you may pay the cost. If 8 or more cards were put into your waiting room by this ability's cost, put all of your opponent's level 3 or lower characters into his or her waiting room, your opponent puts all cards in their deck into his or her waiting room, deal X damage to your opponent, and 【REST】 this card. X is equal to the number of ""Today's Explosion Magic" Megumin" in your level. (Damage may be canceled)
flavor_text: Well, would you still call that a joke spell?!

name: "Beauty in a Yukata" Megumin
expansion: KONOSUBA -God’s blessing on this wonderful world! Legend of Crimson
ability: 【AUTO】 [Put 1 《Adventurer》 or 《Magic》 character from your hand into your clock] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to 2 ""Extreme Misunderstanding" Yunyun", reveal them to your opponent, put them into your hand, and shuffle your deck.

【AUTO】 [Return 2 《Adventurer》 or 《Magic》 characters from your waiting room to your deck & Shuffle your deck] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +1 soul until end of turn.
flavor_text: The friendless wonder seemed lonely, so I invited her to come along.

expansion: KONOSUBA -God’s blessing on this wonderful world! Legend of Crimson
ability: 【CONT】 During your turn, this card gets +1000 power.

【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is an 《Adventurer》 or 《Magic》 character, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +2000 power until end of turn. (Return the revealed card to its original place)

name: Hyoizaburo & Yuiyui
expansion: KONOSUBA -God’s blessing on this wonderful world! Legend of Crimson
ability: 【CONT】 Your other 《Adventurer》 or 《Magic》 character in the middle position of your center stage gets +1000 power.
【ACT】 [(2) 【REST】 this card] Search your deck for up to 1 character with "Megumin(めぐみん)" or "Komekko(こめっこ)" in its card name, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.

ability: 【CONT】 During this card's battle, you cannot play "Backup" from hand.

name: "Discerning Eyes" Sylvia
expansion: KONOSUBA -God’s blessing on this wonderful world! Legend of Crimson
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, this card gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to the number of other 《Devil King Army》 characters or characters with "Kazuma(カズマ)" in its card name you have ×1000.
flavor_text: I think I like you!

name: Devil King Army Invades!
expansion: KONOSUBA -God’s blessing on this wonderful world! Legend of Crimson
ability: Choose 1 of your 【STAND】 《Devil King Army》characters or characters with "Kazuma(カズマ)" in its card name, and 【REST】 it. If you do, search your deck for up to 1 《Devil King Army》 character or character with "Kazuma(カズマ)" in its card name, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, shuffle your deck, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +3000 power until end of turn.

name: Protection of a Goddess
expansion: KONOSUBA -God’s blessing on this wonderful world! Legend of Crimson
ability: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul.
(【GATE】: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 climax in your waiting room, and return it to your hand)

name: Quest Failed
expansion: KONOSUBA -God’s blessing on this wonderful world! Legend of Crimson
ability: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul.
(【DRAW】: When this card triggers, you may draw 1 card)
flavor_text: Hey, are we in debt again now? What are we gonna do?!

name: Invasion of the Crimson Demon Village
expansion: KONOSUBA -God’s blessing on this wonderful world! Legend of Crimson
ability: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul.
(【GATE】: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 climax in your waiting room, and return it to your hand)
flavor_text: You can stand there and watch as I wipe this village off the map!

name: Because Something Is!
expansion: KONOSUBA -God’s blessing on this wonderful world! Legend of Crimson
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on your climax area from your hand, choose up to 1 blue card in your waiting room, put it into your stock, and all of your characters get +1 soul until end of turn.
flavor_text: Kazuma: "Sylvia-san! Sylvia-san! Why do I feel something pressing into my butt?"

name: "A Knight's Duty" Darkness
expansion: PR Card 【Weiẞ Side】
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, you may put the top card of your deck into your waiting room. If that card is a climax, draw 1 card, choose 1 card in your hand, and put it into your waiting room.

【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】, if this card's battle opponent is level 0 or lower, you may put that character into your opponent's stock. If you do, put the bottom card of your opponent's stock into his or her waiting room.
flavor_text: That's a knight's duty, right?

name: "Mattress at Home" Megumin
expansion: PR Card 【Weiẞ Side】
ability: 【CONT】 This card cannot side attack.
【AUTO】 [(1)] At the beginning of the encore step, if you do not have another 【REST】 character on your center stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, 【REST】 this card.

name: "Appearance of the Main Star" Yunyun
expansion: PR Card 【Weiẞ Side】
ability: 【CONT】 If your waiting room has 2 or less climax, this card gets -1 level while in your hand.

【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, look at up to X cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 card from among them, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room. X is equal to the number of 《Adventurer》 or 《Magic》 characters you have.
flavor_text: I can't abandon my friends.

name: "Magical Academy Field Trip" Aqua
expansion: PR Card 【Weiẞ Side】
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, if the character facing this card is level 3 or higher, this card gets +6000 power until end of turn.
flavor_text: Kazuma always gets prickly when the subject of school comes up.
